title: Telex RadioCom Professional Wireless Communication System
item_description:
Telex RadioCom Professional Wireless Communication System

  • Telex RadioCom system includes:
  • (2) BTR800 rackmount main stations
  • (3) TR-800 beltpack transceivers
  • (1) TR-825 beltpack transceiver
  • (2) four-bay battery chargers
  • (8) rechargeable batteries
  • (8) AA battery packs
  • Rolling rack case with drawers
  • Frequency configuration:
  • One BTR800 on frequency group C6
  • One BTR800 on frequency group A1
  • All 4 beltpack transceivers on C6
